channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Wild Cards
channel.desc: A paranoid biomedical engineer with a case of amnesia comes to Ellis for help leading the team down a trail of conspiracies, corruption and secret codes.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: The team reunite but is alarmed when there is a change of management at Nonnatus House; Sister Mary Cynthia's mental health takes a turn for the worse.
